BookmarksBarButton.title: BookmarksBarButton
BookmarksBarButton.description: A template with a label and a special message action (currently only supports OPEN_URL)

CFRUrlbarChiclet.title: CFRUrlbarChiclet
CFRUrlbarChiclet.description: A template with a chiclet button with text.

category.description: Attribute used for different groups of messages from the same provider

layout.description: Describes how content should be displayed.

bucket_id.description: A bucket identifier for the addon. This is used in order to anonymize telemetry for history-sensitive targeting.

notification_text.description: The text in the small blue chicklet that appears in the URL bar. This can be a reference to a localized string in Firefox or just a plain string.

url.description: The page to open when the button is clicked.

where.description: Should it open in a new tab or the current tab

ExtensionDoorhanger.title: ExtensionDoorhanger
ExtensionDoorhanger.description: A template with a heading, addon icon, title and description. No markup allowed.

category.description: Attribute used for different groups of messages from the same provider

layout.description: Attribute used for different groups of messages from the same provider

anchor_id.description: A DOM element ID that the pop-over will be anchored.

alt_anchor_id.description: An alternate DOM element ID that the pop-over will be anchored.

bucket_id.description: A bucket identifier for the addon. This is used in order to anonymize telemetry for history-sensitive targeting.

skip_address_bar_notifier.description: Skip the 'Recommend' notifier and show directly.

persistent_doorhanger.description: Prevent the doorhanger from being dismissed if user interacts with the page or switches between applications.

show_in_private_browsing.description: Whether to allow the message to be shown in private browsing mode. Defaults to false.

notification_text.description: The text in the small blue chicklet that appears in the URL bar. This can be a reference to a localized string in Firefox or just a plain string.

info_icon.description: The small icon displayed in the top right corner of the pop-over. Should be 19x19px, svg or png. Defaults to a small question mark.

tooltiptext.description: Text for button tooltip used to provide information about the doorhanger.

sumo_path.description: Last part of the path in the URL to the support page with the information about the doorhanger.

learn_more.description: Last part of the path in the SUMO URL to the support page with the information about the doorhanger.

heading_text.description: The larger heading text displayed in the pop-over. This can be a reference to a localized string in Firefox or just a plain string.

icon.description: The icon displayed in the pop-over. Should be 32x32px or 64x64px and png/svg.

icon_dark_theme.description: Pop-over icon, dark theme variant. Should be 32x32px or 64x64px and png/svg.

icon_class.description: CSS class of the pop-over icon.

icon.description: The icon displayed in the pop-over. Should be 64x64px and png/svg.

amo_url.description: Link that offers more information related to the addon.

text.description: The body text displayed in the pop-over. This can be a reference to a localized string in Firefox or just a plain string.

descriptionDetails.description: Additional information and steps on how to use

items.description: Id of string to localized addon description

buttons.description: The label and functionality for the buttons in the pop-over.

value.description: Button label override used when a localized version is not available.

accesskey.description: A single character to be used as a shortcut key for the secondary button. This should be one of the characters that appears in the button label.

label.description: Id of localized string or message override.

url.$comment: This is dynamically generated from the addon.id. See CFRPageActions.sys.mjs
url.description: URL used in combination with the primary action dispatched.

allOf.description: Button label override used when a localized version is not available.

accesskey.description: A single character to be used as a shortcut key for the secondary button. This should be one of the characters that appears in the button label.

allOf.description: Id of localized string for button

label.description: Id of localized string or message override.

allOf.description: URL used in combination with the primary action dispatched.

InfoBar.title: InfoBar
InfoBar.description: A template with an image, test and buttons.

type.description: Specifies where the message should appear and persist: 'global' (persists across tabs in the current window), 'tab' (only visible in the current tab), or 'universal' (visible across all tabs and windows, current and future).

text.description: Either a single localizableText, or an array of raw strings and/or localizableText objects. localizableText can contain an optional href property for the text to be rendered as a link.

dismissable.description: Should the infobar include an X dismiss button, defaults to true

label.description: The text label of the button.

supportPage.description: A page title on SUMO to link to

localizableTextWithHref.description: Everything a localizableText allows, plus a required href

rawTextWithHref.description: A literal text chunk that must include href

MenuMessage.title: MenuMessage
MenuMessage.description: A template for messages that appear within our menus.

primaryText.description: The primary text for the message, which offers the value proposition to the user.

secondaryText.description: The second text for the message, which offers more detail on the value proposition to the user.

closeAction.description: The action to take upon clicking the close button.

primaryAction.description: The action to take upon clicking the primary action button.

primaryActionText.description: The label for the primary action.

imageURL.description: URL for image to use with the content.

imageVerticalOffset.description: The margin-block-start value to apply to the image in pixels.

NewtabPromoMessage.title: PBNewtabPromoMessage
NewtabPromoMessage.description: Message shown on the private browsing newtab page.

hideDefault.description: Should we hide the default promo after the experiment promo is dismissed.

infoEnabled.description: Should we show the info section.

infoIcon.description: Icon shown in the left side of the info section. Default is the private browsing icon.

infoTitle.description: Is the title in the info section enabled.

infoTitleEnabled.description: Is the title in the info section enabled.

infoBody.description: Text content in the info section.

infoLinkText.description: Text for the link in the info section.

infoLinkUrl.description: URL for the info section link.

promoEnabled.description: Should we show the promo section.

promoType.description: Promo type used to determine if promo should show to a given user

promoSectionStyle.description: Sets the position of the promo section. Possible values are: top, below-search, bottom. Default bottom.

promoTitle.description: The text content of the promo section.

promoTitleEnabled.description: Should we show text content in the promo section.

promoLinkText.description: The text of the link in the promo box.

promoHeader.description: The title of the promo section.

promoLinkType.description: Type of promo link type. Possible values: link, button. Default is link.

promoImageLarge.description: URL for image used on the left side of the promo box, larger, showcases some feature. Default off.

promoImageSmall.description: URL for image used on the right side of the promo box, smaller, usually a logo. Default off.

NewtabMessage.title: NewtabMessage
NewtabMessage.description: A template for messages that are rendered within newtab

Spotlight.title: Spotlight
Spotlight.description: A template with an image, title, content and two buttons.

template.description: Specify the layout template for the Spotlight

imageURL.description: URL for image to use with the content

imageId.description: The ID for a remotely hosted image

transitions.description: Show transitions within and between screens

disableEscClose.description: Don't allow the message to be dismissed using the ESC key - for limited use in Spotlight modals only when the message content clearly informs the user that a decision is required to proceed

disableHistoryUpdates.description: Don't alter the browser session's history stack - used with messaging surfaces like Feature Callouts

startScreen.description: Index of first screen to show from message, defaulting to 0

no-rdm.description: If true, prevents the spotlight from entering responsive design mode at widths less than 800px

template.description: Specify whether the surface is shown as a Spotlight modal or an in-surface Feature Callout dialog

ToastNotification.title: ToastNotification
ToastNotification.description: A template for toast notifications displayed by the Alert service.

title.description: Id of localized string or message override of toast notification title

body.description: Id of localized string or message override of toast notification body

icon_url.description: The URL of the image used as an icon of the toast notification.

image_url.description: The URL of an image to be displayed as part of the notification.

launch_url.description: The URL to launch when the notification or an action button is clicked.

type.description: The launch action to be performed when Firefox is launched.

requireInteraction.description: Whether the toast notification should remain active until the user clicks or dismisses it, rather than closing automatically.

tag.description: An identifying tag for the toast notification.

data.description: Arbitrary data associated with the toast notification.

title.description: The action text to be shown to the user.

iconURL.description: URL of an icon to display with the action.

windowsSystemActivationType.description: Whether to have Windows process the given `action`.

type.description: The launch action to be performed when Firefox is launched.

ToolbarBadgeMessage.title: ToolbarBadgeMessage
ToolbarBadgeMessage.description: A template that specifies to which element in the browser toolbar to add a notification.

action.description: Optional action to take in addition to showing the notification

delay.description: Optional delay in ms after which to show the notification

badgeDescription.description: This is used in combination with the badged button to offer a text based alternative to the visual badging. Example 'New Feature: What's New'

UpdateAction.title: UpdateActionMessage
UpdateAction.description: A template for messages that execute predetermined actions.

data.description: Additional data provided as argument when executing the action

url.description: URL data to be used as argument to the action

expireDelta.description: Expiration timestamp to be used as argument to the action

action.description: Optional action to take in addition to showing the notification

groups.description: Array of preferences used to control `enabled` status of the group. If any is `false` the group is disabled.

template.description: Which messaging template this message is using.

frequency.description: An object containing frequency cap information for a message.

lifetime.description: The maximum lifetime impressions for a message.

custom.description: An array of custom frequency cap definitions.

items.description: A frequency cap definition containing time and max impression information

period.description: Period of time in milliseconds (e.g. 86400000 for one day)

cap.description: The maximum impressions for the message within the defined period.

priority.description: The priority of the message. If there are two competing messages to show, the one with the highest priority will be shown

order.description: The order in which messages should be shown. Messages will be shown in increasing order.

targeting.description: A JEXL expression representing targeting information

trigger.description: An action to trigger potentially showing the message

id.description: A string identifying the trigger action

params.description: An optional array of string parameters for the trigger action

provider.description: An identifier for the provider of this message, such as "cfr" or "preview".

string_id.description: Id of localized string to be rendered.

localizableText.description: Either a raw string or an object containing the string_id of the localized text

TemplatedMessage.description: An FxMS message of one of a variety of types.

MultiMessage.description: An object containing an array of messages.
